page.title: 16WORKING WATER MILL, TILSTON
page.content: In our area can be found{Stretton {Mill.}It is a{water mill}that had been in a bad state of repair. About 7 years ago Cheshire County Council restored the mill to working order, major repairs took place and it became a{working museum. It is open to the{public from Easter {until October.}The museum is divided into a working mill and display area. Inside the display area can be found photographs, objects and useful information. Downstairs can be found the museum shop that sells flour, postcards, posters and books related to mills. There is a{picnic area}and car park facilities. A guide gives tourists{guided tours and actually {works the mill.}There are 2 types of water wheel. The mill dates back to the{16th. century}and was part of the {Leche}estate.
